## English production with language profile

```{r}
eng = data %>%
  filter(Language=="eng")
head(eng)

```

```{r}
eng_formula = "stress ~ v_dur_period*lang_profile*syllable + f0*lang_profile*syllable + syl_dur*lang_profile*syllable +  sF1_norm_center*lang_profile*syllable + sF2_norm_center*lang_profile*syllable + (v_dur_period * syllable + f0 * syllable + syl_dur * syllable + sF1_norm_center*syllable + sF2_norm_center*syllable|partID)"

eng_priors <- get_prior(eng_formula,eng,family=bernoulli())

eng_model <- brm(formula=bf(eng_formula,autocor = ~ 0),data=eng, family=bernoulli(), 
            prior=eng_priors, cores = 8, save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE), iter=4000)
```

Examine results

```{r}
summary(eng_model)
bayes_R2(eng_model)
```

Visualize results

```{r}
eng_posterior <- as.array(eng_model)  # prepare to plot the brm result
dim(eng_posterior)
dimnames(eng_posterior)$variable[1:50]
```

```{r}
eng_lang_coeff_plot = mcmc_areas(eng_posterior, pars = c("b_v_dur_period", "b_lang_profilel3_eng", "b_lang_profilemono", "b_syllableult", "b_f0", "b_syl_dur", "b_sF1_norm_center", "b_sF2_norm_center", "b_v_dur_period:lang_profilel3_eng", "b_v_dur_period:lang_profilemono", "b_v_dur_period:syllableult", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult", "b_lang_profilemono:syllableult", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:f0", "b_lang_profilemono:f0", "b_syllableult:f0", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syl_dur", "b_lang_profilemono:syl_dur", "b_syllableult:syl_dur", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:sF1_norm_center", "b_lang_profilemono:sF1_norm_center", "b_syllableult:sF1_norm_center", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:sF2_norm_center", "b_lang_profilemono:sF2_norm_center", "b_syllableult:sF2_norm_center", "b_v_dur_period:lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult", "b_v_dur_period:lang_profilemono:syllableult", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult:f0", "b_lang_profilemono:syllableult:f0", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult:syl_dur", "b_lang_profilemono:syllableult:syl_dur", "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult:sF1_norm_center", "b_lang_profilemono:syllableult:sF1_norm_center",  "b_lang_profilel3_eng:syllableult:sF2_norm_center","b_lang_profilemono:syllableult:sF2_norm_center"), 
          prob = 0.8, # 80% intervals
          prob_outer = 0.95, # 95%
          point_est = "median") +
scale_y_discrete(labels=c("Monolingual:Ultimate syllable:F2",  "L3 English:Ultimate syllable:F2", "Monolingual:Ultimate syllable:F1", "L3 English:Ultimate syllable:F1", "Monolingual:Ultimate syllable:Syllable duration", "L3 English:Ultimate syllable:Syllable duration", "Monolingual:Ultimate syllable:F0", "L3 English:Ultimate syllable:F0", "Vowel duration (periodic):Monolingual:Ultimate syllable", "Vowel duration (periodic):L3 English:Ultimate syllable", "Ultimate syllable:F2", "Monolingual:F2", "L3 English:F2", "Ultimate syllable:F1", "Monolingual:F1", "L3 English:F1", "Ultimate syllable:Syllable duration", "Monolingual:Syllable duration", "L3 English:Syllable duration", "Ultimate syllable:F0", "Monolingual:F0", "L3 English:F0", "Monolingual:Ultimate syllable", "L3 English:Ultimate syllable", "Vowel duration (periodic):Ultimate syllable", "Vowel duration (periodic):Monolingual", "Vowel duration (periodic):L3 English", "F2", "F1", "Syllable duration", "F0", "Ultimate syllable", "Monolingual", "L3 English", "Vowel duration (periodic)"), limits=rev) +
  labs(title = "Coefficients of English production", x ="Coefficient, sd(Stress)") +theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5))
eng_lang_coeff_plot
```
```{r}

```

```{r}
conditions_lang = data.frame(lang_profile = c("mono", "l1_eng", "l3_eng"))
eng_f2_lang_syllable = conditional_effects(eng_model, effects = "sF2_norm_center:syllable", conditions = conditions_lang)
```

```{r}
eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot = plot(eng_f2_lang_syllable, plot = FALSE)[[1]] + labs(title = "English production", x = "Normalized F2", y = "Proportion stressed") + 
guides(color=guide_legend(title="Syllable"), fill = 'none') +
  scale_color_discrete(labels=c('Penultimate', 'Ultimate')) +
  theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust = 0.5), legend.position = "bottom")

eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__ <- ifelse(eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "1", "Monolingual",
ifelse(eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "2", "L1 English",
ifelse(eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__ == "3", "L3 English", 99)))


eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__ <- factor(eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot$data$cond__, levels = c("Monolingual", "L1 English", "L3 English"))

eng_f2_lang_syllable_plot
```
